name: Dr.Pumpkin (funcybear)
description:
Dr.Pumpkin and his friends are trying to take over the world! 

"You are the only person who can stop him! Good Luck Solider have fun. To beat the game you need to find a key or a weapon to win the level!" -Mr.Bob
